title: 闲谈建筑风格
author: dtsyyz
txt_content: 我算半个建筑师吧，喜欢在服务器建筑，平时会看看建筑教程，我个人比较偏爱和风和中国古风，你们喜欢什么风格？

replies.author: 凋灵斯拉
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢大坑风格（TNT炸的）

replies.author: WarHawk
replies.txt_content: 我比较喜欢现代风格

replies.author: xKsyStudio
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢古风

replies.author: 岁月静好、
replies.txt_content:
凋灵斯拉 发表于 2020-3-7 10:56
我喜欢大坑风格（TNT炸的）
大坑风格和可还行！

replies.author: 艾克斯
replies.txt_content: 我比较喜欢未来风格，不过我只会火柴盒风格2333

replies.author: 小鑫emm
replies.txt_content: 喜欢火柴盒风格
火柴盒,就像这个贴里的https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... id=978878&page=

replies.author: RolleLagrange
replies.txt_content: 现代吧，但是自己只会火柴盒，顶多双层火柴盒

replies.author: 羅馬假日
replies.txt_content: 幻想乡风格~

replies.author: dtsyyz
replies.txt_content:
羅馬假日 发表于 2020-3-7 11:01
幻想乡风格~
靠，越共无处不在

replies.author: 岁月静好、
replies.txt_content: 中国风呗！

replies.author: 贴吧1wwww88
replies.txt_content: 巨  型  火  柴  盒

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢古风，但是没技术。。

replies.author: 我的世界162
replies.txt_content: 哥特式！！！

replies.author: 萌萌黑雪姬
replies.txt_content: 日式 古风吧....看的舒服

replies.author: fcukdoing
replies.txt_content: 还得是古风

replies.author: Magma_
replies.txt_content: 个人喜欢介于国风和和风之间的那种风格

replies.author: jinvgy
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢地底风格（指打洞）

replies.author: (=°ω°)丿
replies.txt_content: 火柴盒风

replies.author: YonderVoice
replies.txt_content: 现代or地洞

replies.author: mmoo1122
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢火柴盒

replies.author: ArthurMorgan
replies.txt_content: 日式和中国风 东方这种

replies.author: 天启-麒麟
replies.txt_content: 中式古建啊肯定 咱们中国文化博大精深

replies.author: Zahi
replies.txt_content: 古风会喜欢的多一些

replies.author: 猫眼
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢现代风

replies.author: w841488655
replies.txt_content: 我也是，这个可能比较容易？

replies.author: heiweigoo
replies.txt_content: 古风把

replies.txt_content: 那种中世纪的画风我比较爱awa

replies.author: 凛夜丶雨月
replies.txt_content: 差不多，但是我只是喜欢住，不会建。。。

replies.author: ghzz
replies.txt_content: 喜欢古希腊建筑和巴洛克风格建筑（喜欢挖地洞）
